title: Thermoformable Shell
team: Donghyeon Ko, Myeongseong Kim, Woohun Lee
summary: A thermoformable shell called TF-Shell that allows repeatable thermoforming of 3D printed objects.
Through embedding TF-Shell, users can thermoform target parts in diverse ways.

paragraph: A thermoformable shell called TF-Shell that allows repeatable thermoforming of 3D printed objects.
Due to the low thermal conductivity of typical printing materials like polylactic acid (PLA), thermoforming 3D printed objects is largely limited.
Through embedding TF-Shell, users can thermoform target parts in diverse ways.
Moreover, the deformed structures can be restored by reheating.
